```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
#install.packages("janeaustenr")
library(janeaustenr)
```

```{r}
a_books <- austen_books()
#the data is currently stored by line in the book

#splitup the 'text' variable in a_books into tokens of our choosing. Using "words" in this example
a_words <- a_books %>% unnest_tokens(word, text)

#which words are most popular for each book?
popular_words <- a_words %>% count(book, word, sort = TRUE) 

words_per_book <- popular_words %>%
  group_by(book) %>%
  summarise(total = sum(n))

popular_words <-left_join(popular_words, words_per_book)
```
